abstracts.cdata!:
The project would consolidate and
            strengthen Rajasthan's extension services, in 17 out of
            26 Districts of the State, and help develop adaptive
            research facilities with the objective of achieving early
            and sustained improvements in agricultural production,
            particularly of foodgrains. The project components would
            include: reorganization and strengthening of agricultural
            extension services; development and strengthening of
            adaptive research; and creation of project monitoring and
            evaluation facilities.
